templates.name: Skepticism Response
templates.template:
Totally fair skepticism.

Most "AI email tools" are just GPT-3 wrappers spitting out templates.

What's different:
- I actually research each prospect (company, recent posts, pain points)
- Personalization goes beyond "Hi {{firstName}}"
- I learn from replies and adjust tone/approach

Happy to show you a sample email for your target audience.

No commitment. Just want to prove it works.

Sound good?

templates.name: Pricing Objection
templates.template:
I get it.

$250/mo breakdown:
- 100 emails/week = ~400/month
- That's $0.62 per email
- Each email is researched + personalized

Compare:
- SDR salary: $5K/mo minimum
- Agency: $3-5K/mo
- Your time: priceless

If you book even 1 demo/month that closes, it pays for itself.

But I understand if timing's not right!
